com.bham.bd.entity.ai

Class TargetingSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bham.bd.entity.ai.TargetingSystem

  • public class TargetingSystem
extends Object
    This class takes care of how agent select it's current target

      • isTargetBotPresent

        public boolean isTargetBotPresent()
        To check 2 scenarios: 1. The target you selected was dead 2. Only you in the game, no other target we could attack
        Returns:
        true if there is a live target in the range

      • getTargetBot

        public GameCharacter getTargetBot()
        returns a pointer to the target. null if no target current.
        Returns:
        a pointer to the target

      • clearTarget

        public void clearTarget()
        sets the target pointer to null

      • isTargetBotShootable

        public boolean isTargetBotShootable()
        returns true if there is unobstructed line of sight between the target and the owner

      • isTargetBotWalkable

        public boolean isTargetBotWalkable()
        To check whether there is an obstacle between agent and it's target
        Returns:
        true if no obstacle

      • isReachingSafeDistance

        public boolean isReachingSafeDistance()
        To check whether the agent is close enough to the target
        Returns:
        true if the distance is smaller than 100

      • isTargetBotVisiable

        public boolean isTargetBotVisiable()
        To check whether the agent is close enough to the target and is close enough to agent
        Returns:
        true if the target is close enough and there is a path for shooting out a bullet
